subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic beat Julien Benneteau, 6-1, 6-3, in just over an hour to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
snippet: Novak Djokovic beat Julien Benneteau, 6-1, 6-3, in just over an hour to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
